fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.architectures

Class RTComponentAtomicModelDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.AbstractAtomicModelDescriptor
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.AtomicModelDescriptor
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.RTAtomicModelDescriptor
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.architectures.RTComponentAtomicModelDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentModelDescriptorI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.ModelDescriptorI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.RTModelDescriptorI, java.io.Serializable

    public class RTComponentAtomicModelDescriptor
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.RTAtomicModelDescriptor
implements ComponentModelDescriptorI
    The class RTComponentAtomicModelDescriptor implements a descriptor of a DEVS real time atomic model that is held by a BCM component in a BCM component assembly.

    Description

    If Java allowed multiple inheritance, this class would inherit from both ComponentAtomicModelDescriptor and RTAtomicModelDescriptor. Without this possibility, the choice here is to inherit from RTAtomicModelDescriptor and copy the code from ComponentAtomicModelDescriptor. See both for more documentation applying to this class.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2020-12-15

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI compose(ComponentModelArchitectureI architecture, java.lang.String creatorPnipURI)
      As models inside components need not be created but are rather created by the components themselves before composing them, this method is not necessary for component atomic models.
